controller

Class AssetLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.AssetLoader

  • public class AssetLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to load in animation pngs with some helper methods

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static AssetLoader getAssetLoader() 
      void loadAnimalAnimations()
      This method iterates the Animal enum and for each one loads in the animations for forward motion, backward motion, or death png if they exist.
      void loadBackground(ViewingPanel viewingPanel)
      Loads background image and sets it as background in the viewing panel

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getAssetLoader

        public static AssetLoader getAssetLoader()

      • loadBackground

        public void loadBackground(ViewingPanel viewingPanel)
        Loads background image and sets it as background in the viewing panel
        Parameters:
        viewingPanel - custom swing panel to have the given background

      • loadAnimalAnimations

        public void loadAnimalAnimations()
        This method iterates the Animal enum and for each one loads in the animations for forward motion, backward motion, or death png if they exist. Tries both animation.png and animation[number] png given by a value in Animal. If image is one png it is broken into the sequence using number in the enum
